question_cn: 你经常交新朋友吗？
question_en: Do you regularly make new friends?

question_cn: 你是否在空闲时间里花很多时间探索吸引你的各种随机话题？
question_en: Do you spend a lot of your free time exploring various random topics that pique your interest?

question_cn: 看到别人哭很容易让你也想哭吗？
question_en: Does seeing other people cry easily make you feel like you want to cry too?

question_cn: 你经常为备份计划制定备份计划吗？
question_en: Do you often make a backup plan for a backup plan?

question_cn: 即使在很大的压力下，你通常还是很冷静吗？
question_en: Do you usually stay calm, even under a lot of pressure?

question_cn: 在社交活动中，你是不是很少向新认识的人介绍自己，而主要和你已经认识的人交谈？
question_en: At social events, do you rarely try to introduce yourself to new people and mostly talk to the ones you already know?

question_cn: 你更喜欢先完全完成一个项目再开始另一个项目吗？
question_en: Do you prefer to completely finish one project before starting another?

question_cn: 你会形容自己是非常多愁善感的人吗？
question_en: Would you describe yourself as very sentimental?

question_cn: 你喜欢使用诸如日程表和清单之类的组织工具吗？
question_en: Do you like to use organizing tools like schedules and lists?

question_cn: 即使是一个小错误也会让你怀疑自己的总体能力和知识吗？
question_en: Does even a small mistake cause you to doubt your overall abilities and knowledge?

question_cn: 你是否觉得只需要和你认为有趣的人交谈就会让你感到很自在？
question_en: Do you feel comfortable just walking up to someone you find interesting and striking up a conversation?

question_cn: 你对讨论创意作品的各种解读和分析不太感兴趣吗？
question_en: Are you not particularly keen on discussing various interpretations and analyses of creative works?

question_cn: 你更倾向于用头脑思考而不是跟随内心的感觉吗？
question_en: Do you tend to follow your head more than your heart?

question_cn: 你是不是通常喜欢随心所欲地做事，而不是坚持某种特定的日常流程？
question_en: Do you often do what you feel like at any moment rather than sticking to a particular daily routine?

question_cn: 你是否很少担心你给认识的人留下的印象？
question_en: Do you rarely worry about the impression you leave on people you meet?

question_cn: 你喜欢参加团队活动吗？
question_en: Do you enjoy taking part in group activities?

question_cn: 你喜欢那些让你自己解读结局的书籍和电影吗？
question_en: Do you appreciate books and movies that allow you to form your own interpretation of the ending?

question_cn: 帮助他人取得成就比自己的成就更能带给你快乐吗？
question_en: Do you find more happiness in helping others achieve things compared to your own accomplishments?

question_cn: 你对很多事情都很感兴趣，以至于很难选择下一步要尝试什么吗？
question_en: Are you so intrigued by various things that you often struggle with what to pursue next?

question_cn: 你经常担心情况会变得更糟吗？
question_en: Do you often worry that situations might worsen?

question_cn: 你是否倾向于避免在团队中担任领导角色？
question_en: Do you tend to avoid taking on leadership roles in group situations?

question_cn: 你会说你真的不是艺术型的人吗？
question_en: Would you say you're not really the artistic type?

question_cn: 你认为如果人们更理智、少一些情感化，这个世界会更好吗？
question_en: Do you believe the world would be better if people were more rational and less emotional?

question_cn: 你通常会在让自己放松之前先完成家务吗？
question_en: Do you usually finish your chores before giving yourself time to relax?

question_cn: 你喜欢看人们争论吗？
question_en: Do you find it enjoyable to watch people argue?

question_cn: 你通常避免引起对自己的关注吗？
question_en: Do you usually avoid drawing attention to yourself?

question_cn: 你的心情是否往往变化得很快？
question_en: Does your mood tend to fluctuate rapidly?

question_cn: 你对那些不如你效率高的人会不耐烦吗？
question_en: Do you get impatient with people who aren't as efficient as you?

question_cn: 你经常在最后一刻完成任务吗？
question_en: Do you frequently find yourself doing tasks at the very last moment?

question_cn: 你一直对死后可能会发生什么事情感到好奇吗？
question_en: Have you always been intrigued by the question of what might happen after death?

question_cn: 你通常更喜欢与他人在一起，而不是独自一人吗？
question_en: Do you generally enjoy being around others more than being by yourself?

question_cn: 当讨论变得非常理论化时，你会失去兴趣吗？
question_en: Do you tend to lose interest when discussions become very theoretical?

question_cn: 对于经历与你大不相同的人，你容易产生共鸣吗？
question_en: Is it easy for you to empathize with someone who has had experiences quite different from yours?

question_cn: 你通常会尽可能地延迟做最终决定吗？
question_en: Do you often delay making final decisions as long as you can?

question_cn: 你很少质疑或怀疑你所做的选择吗？
question_en: Do you seldom question or doubt the choices you've made?

question_cn: 经过一个疲惫的星期后，一个热闹的社交活动能让你恢复活力吗？
question_en: After an exhausting week, do you find that a lively social event rejuvenates you?

question_cn: 你喜欢参观艺术博物馆吗？
question_en: Do you like visiting art museums?

question_cn: 你经常觉得很难理解他人的情感吗？
question_en: Do you frequently find it challenging to understand other people's emotions?

question_cn: 你喜欢为每一天准备一个待办事项清单吗？
question_en: Do you prefer having a to-do list prepared for each day?

question_cn: 你很少感到不安全吗？
question_en: Do you seldom feel insecure?

question_cn: 你倾向于避免打电话吗？
question_en: Do you tend to avoid making phone calls?

question_cn: 你经常花很多时间尝试理解与自己截然不同的观点吗？
question_en: Do you frequently invest time in trying to understand perspectives very different from yours?

question_cn: 在你的社交圈中，你经常是联系朋友并发起活动的那个人吗？
question_en: In your group of friends, are you usually the one reaching out and suggesting activities?

question_cn: 如果你的计划被打断，你的首要任务是尽快回到正轨吗？
question_en: If something disrupts your plans, do you prioritize getting back on track immediately?

question_cn: 你是否仍然为很久以前犯的错误而困扰？
question_en: Are you still troubled by mistakes you committed a long time back?

question_cn: 你很少思考人类存在的原因或生活的意义吗？
question_en: Do you seldom ponder about the reasons for human existence or life's purpose?

question_cn: 你觉得你的情感经常控制你，超过你控制它们吗？
question_en: Do you feel that your emotions often have more control over you than you have over them?

question_cn: 即使完全是他们的错，你也会小心翼翼地不让人看起来很糟糕吗？
question_en: Do you go out of your way to avoid making others look bad, even if they're clearly at fault?

question_cn: 你会说你的工作风格更偏向于能量的自发爆发，而不是有组织和持续的努力吗？
question_en: Would you say your work style leans more towards spontaneous bursts of energy rather than steady and organized efforts?

question_cn: 当有人高度评价你时，你是否经常想知道他们对你失望要多久？
question_en: When someone holds you in high regard, do you often wonder how long before they get disappointed in you?

question_cn: 你会喜欢一个大部分时间都需要你独自工作的工作吗？
question_en: Would you prefer a job that entails working solo for the majority of the time?

question_cn: 你认为深入探讨抽象的哲学问题是浪费时间吗？
question_en: Do you think that dwelling on abstract philosophical topics is just a waste of time?

question_cn: 与安静、亲密的地方相比，你更喜欢繁忙、喧闹的环境吗？
question_en: Are you more attracted to lively, bustling environments than to quiet and intimate settings?

question_cn: 你经常可以一眼就看出某人的感受吗？
question_en: Can you often tell how someone is feeling just by a quick glance?

question_cn: 你经常感到不知所措或情感上的压力吗？
question_en: Do you frequently feel overwhelmed by situations or emotions?

question_cn: 你是否以有条不紊的方式完成任务，确保不漏掉任何步骤？
question_en: Do you approach tasks in a methodical manner, ensuring you don't miss any steps?

question_cn: 你是否对被视为有争议的主题或事务非常感兴趣？
question_en: Are you highly captivated by subjects or matters that are deemed controversial?

question_cn: 如果你认为其他人更需要，你会放弃一个好的机会吗？
question_en: Would you give up a favorable opportunity if you believed someone else required it more?

question_cn: 你是否经常发现很难在截止日期之前完成任务？
question_en: Do you often find it challenging to meet deadlines?

question_cn: 你是否对事情最终会对你有利感到自信？
question_en: Are you confident that, in the end, things will turn out well for you?
